The New Yorker app is your digital destination for in-depth reporting, political and cultural commentary, fiction, and humor from New Yorker staff writers and contributors around the world.

Stay up to date. 
Read or listen to top stories from your favorite writers, every day. Turn on notifications so you never miss an important story or your favorite topic. 

Be transported.
News and politics. Books and culture. Fiction and poetry. Discover rich storytelling and rigorous reporting that will sweep you away and introduce you to something new. 

Go about your day.
When your hands are full, listen to featured stories read by world-class narrators. If you need a break, solve a crossword puzzle or Name Drop quiz, and flip through a nearly endless supply of cartoons. And, when you’re on the go, save stories to access them on any device, even offline.

The app is free to download. Subscribers receive unlimited access. Most current New Yorker subscribers have unlimited access to the app as part of their existing subscription. 1. Overview

HALI Australia is a pioneering platform in Migration Technology (MigraTech) supporting Vietnamese high net-worth individuals and successful entrepreneurs who are migrating to Australia under the Federal Government’s Business Innovation & Investment Programme (BIIP - visa subclasses 188/888 & 132).  

2. Vision & Mission

Our vision is to help entrepreneurs to settle and integrate into the Australian way of life as quickly, easily and most conveniently as possible.  

HALI Australia's mission is to make your life in Australia better, happier, and more successful by:
-	Provide up-to-date information related to Australia from trusted sources
-	Connect you to reputable, highly specialized Vietnamese experts across Australia to assist you with everyday needs.
-	Bring convenience and comfort with the optimal, safe and efficient technology platform

II. About the App 

 
1. Brief description

HALI Australia (Client version) provides an overview of Australia to business migrants (the users) by the way of providing many useful and up-to-date articles from trusted sources. In addition, HALI Australia also connects users to reputable, highly specialized Vietnamese experts across Australia to assist them with everyday needs via the provided platform.

2. Main target users

HALI Australia is an application for Vietnamese high net-worth individuals and successful entrepreneurs who are migrating to Australia.

MDLA is a new kind of fashion magazine - a fashion magazine designed for how we consume fashion online today.

Many of us born in an online generation can only sigh in nostalgia at the glamour and wonder of print fashion magazines from the early 2000s. As the world moved online, the once iconic fashion media companies failed to evolve - they gave us lazy pdfs to browse on slow and buggy e-readers as Inst*gr*m took over to give us the fast immersive content we wanted. Their disinterest in the preservation of beauty online is clear and it’s time we had a new medium to explore and appreciate fashion for fashion’s sake. MDLA is an experiment to revive the glory of early fashion media re-imagined through powerful online media technology from present day.
